entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet test` fails with "Bad IL format" when running on .NET 9 SDK (9.0.203) but works with .NET 8 SDK #48320
  • H #48294

Closed

  • dotnet nuget why doesn't spot existence of dependency #47982
  • Ensure `TestTfmsInParallel` works for the new dotnet test experience #47496
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet run app.cs is creating obj if there are shebang directives #48278
    10.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Support OfficialBuildId for SB #48327
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not build SDK installers in source-build #48322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable arm64 DEB tests #48319
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip second build if possible with 'dotnet run file' #48318
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [StaticWebAssets] Rename WriteImportMapToHtml to OverrideHtmlAssetPlaceholders #48312
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • Promote `NuGet.Client` builds during official CI #48311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Put tests back again #48310
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [browser] Consider WasmSDK projects RID agnostic #48309
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • dotnet test for MTP: Normalize TFMs #48306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48305
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support --no-launch-profile-arguments in dotnet test for MTP #48304
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Reorganize dotnet.Tests folder structure + other #48280
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48279
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #48314
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix publishing workload pack msi packages in SDK official build #48317
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable VMR synchronization for aspire #48316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet test for MTP: Support TestTfmsInParallel #48246
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48295
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Roslyn to parse directives in file-based programs #47978
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48271
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48253
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable SSH in GH Codespaces #48277
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • tool install/update: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Update the sign check to remove the exclusions but only check on sign… #48275
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Updating breaking change guidance #48184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.1xx #48266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Encode container image manifests in ImageBuilder via Encoder Fixes #47399 #48255
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    Servicing-consider, Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test for MTP Retry feature #47727
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet test for MTP] Throw exception if the project doesn't produce executable #48065
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make 'dotnet run file' tests runnable on localized machines #48264
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.105 April 2025 Updates #48274
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
